name: Esteem
description:
• Project done over the course of my game developer training (Interface 3)

My second game with Game Maker, done over the course of one month. The rule was to create a game inspired by a comic book from a Belgian artist.

In this game, you play as a person's self-esteem, which has recently taken a blow after one too many negative critics. Navigating through their inner psyche, you must gather back all the self-love you can find, while dodging the negative thoughts lurking around every corner...
